attributes.title: Hollow Knight
attributes.description:
## Descend into Hallownest

Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes.

**Key Features:**
- Hand-drawn 2D art and animation
- Challenging combat and platforming
- Over 130 enemies and 30 epic bosses
- Evolving story told through environmental storytelling
attributes.systemRequirements:
**Minimum Requirements:**
- OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
- Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
- Memory: 4 GB RAM
- Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
- Storage: 9 GB available space
